statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={169.5}{e}^{{{0.0288}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements; round accordingly.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0288}}\approx{1.0292187301434}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0292187301434}-{1}={0.029218730143355}\approx{0.0292} and the percent is 2.92.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
